author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Complete first level of debugging V10 geometry of HGCal

#### PR validation:

Tested with the two workflows 24034.0 (D28 geometry) and 29034.0 (D41 geometry)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

The changes are bug removals and hence applicable to pre3 and pre4 of 10_6_0
title: Run2-hgx192 Complete first level of debugging geometry
